title: JSW MG Motor to launch an electric CUV in India to take on Tata Curvv EV
description: MG Motor India, a SAIC and JSW venture, will launch a sub Rs 20 lakh electric CUV by the festive season. The 'Intelligent CUV' features a 50.3 kWh battery, 176 hp motor, tall stance, and coupe-like roof. Expected to surpass ZS EV's 461 km range. MG saw 39% sales growth and 95% ZS EV sales increase. Competing with Tata Motors.
